nodes.bodyText: You could keep using resourceType instead of going back to briefObject.getResourceType()
weird, not sure why I did that

I don't see <h1> being used on the other record pages for the title, they seem to be doing h2. Also, I think this should be briefObject.title? Unless briefObject is actually just the title in this case unlike the others

nodes.bodyText: I think a bunch of the processing in this class was written against any older version of jdom. These days you can store List<Element> directly from getChildren rather than having to cast things below. Same could be said for almost all the other extract methods in this class though.
if you only care about the first one, you could break out of the loop when it finds the collection number rather than continuing to look. In that case you wouldn't need a List either.
